name: Civilian
desc: If there is a Civilian alive, your team is inspired to protect them by gaining Mana every @Seconds@ seconds.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) +@ManaRegen@ Mana</expandRow>

name: A.D.M.I.N.
desc: A.D.M.I.N. programs a custom configuration per player each game.
<row>(@MinUnits@) [Initialize ADMIN cause and effect]</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) [Add another effect to the program]. Boost all tiers by @4Tooltip@%</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) Boost previous tiers by @6Tooltip@%</row>

name: Anima Squad
desc: Anima Squad members pose after champion kills, increasing their fame. Each point of fame grants @HealthPerStack@ permanent Health to each Anima Squad member.
They also gain:
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @InitialAD@% Attack Damage and @InitialAP@ Ability Power</expandRow>
Total fame: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT8_AnimaFameStacks@
Bonus Health: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT8_AnimaFameHP@

name: LaserCorps
desc: When a LaserCorp drone pilot attacks or is hit by an attack, their combat drone deals magic damage to the agent's target (@ICD@ second cooldown).
When a unit with a drone dies, the drone is reassigned to another unit with a drone.
Drone lasers deal:
<row>(@MinUnits@) @MagicDamage@ magic damage</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @MagicDamage@ magic damage</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @MagicDamage@ magic damage. All champions get a LaserCorp drone. </row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @MagicDamage@ magic damage. All champions get a LaserCorp drone. </row>
Drone damage last round: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT8_Lasercorps_DamageTRAKey@ magic damage

name: Brawler
desc: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) +@BonusPercentHealth*100@% maximum Health</expandRow>

name: Mecha:PRIME
desc: Use the Mecha selector item to choose a PRIME.
Combat start: The PRIME combines with the 2 nearest Mecha, absorbing @HealthPercent@% of their Base Health.
<row>(@MinUnits@) The PRIME gains @APAmount@ Ability Power and @ADPercent@% Attack Damage</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) All Mechas gain @APAmount@ Ability Power and @ADPercent@% Attack Damage; the PRIME gains double this amount</row>

name: Threat
desc: Threats do not have a Trait bonus, but instead have powerful Abilities and increased base stats.

name: Quickdraw
desc: After every 2 damaging ability projectiles, Quickdraw units fire a bonus ability projectile. Bonus shots deal:
<row>(@MinUnits@) @DamageModifier*100@% total damage. </row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @DamageModifier*100@% total damage. </row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @DamageModifier*100@% total damage. </row>

name: Mascot
desc: Your team heals a percentage of their maximum Health every @Seconds@ seconds, and Mascots heal double the amount.
When Mascots die, they retreat to the sidelines to cheer on your team. Your team's healing increases by @HealthRegenPerMascot@% for each cheering Mascot.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @BaseHealthRegen@% healing</expandRow>

name: Forecaster
desc: Depending on the weather, The Forecaster grants a different bonus to adjacent allies. The weather changes every game.

name: Ace
desc: This Trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Aces.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Execute enemies under @ExecuteThreshhold@% Health </expandRow>

name: Duelist
desc: Innate: Increased movement speed.
Duelists' attacks grant bonus Attack Speed, up to @MaxStacks@ stacks.
<row> (@MinUnits@) +@ASPerStack@% Attack Speed per stack</row>
<row> (@MinUnits@) +@ASPerStack@% Attack Speed per stack</row>
<row> (@MinUnits@) +@ASPerStack@% Attack Speed per stack; Duelists take @DRPercent@% less damage</row>
<row> (@MinUnits@) +@ASPerStack@% Attack Speed per stack; Duelists take @DRPercent@% less damage</row>

name: Parallel
desc: (@MinUnits@) Ezreal learns from his older, more handsome self and joins him in future adventures.
Ezreal's Ability becomes a blast that hits all enemies in a line.
Ultimate Ezreal's Ability summons one additional temporal duplicate.

name: Ox Force
desc: Ox Force units gain bonus defenses. Once per combat, when they would drop below one health, they instead go to one health and become immune to damage for @Seconds@ second.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @Defenses@ Armor and Magic Resist</expandRow>

name: Arsenal
desc: (@MinUnits@) When deploying the Arsenal champion, players may choose which weapon he will equip.

name: Aegis
desc: Your team gains bonus Magic Resist, and Aegis units gain more.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) +@MagicResist@ Magic Resist, +@AegisMagicResist@ for Aegis</expandRow>

name: Underground
desc: The Underground must sneak through the sewers after each player combat and crack @RoundCount@ locks to open a vault. When the vault opens, you may choose to take the loot now, or attempt another heist for even better rewards.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @WinProgress@ locks per win, @LossProgress@ per loss</expandRow>
Current Heist Level: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT8_Underground_CurrentStage@

name: Star Guardian
desc: Star Guardians gain more Mana in combat.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @AdditionalManaPercentage@% Mana</expandRow>

name: Prankster
desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Once per combat at @HealthThreshold@% Health, Pranksters spawn a target dummy, move to a safe location, and restore @HealthRegen@ Health. </row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) And, Prankster dummies stun the enemy that killed them for @StunDuration@ seconds.</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) The Health restore is increased to @HealthRegen@ Health and the stun duration becomes @StunDuration@ seconds.</row>

name: Heart
desc: When Heart units cast their Ability, your team gains stacking Ability Power for the rest of combat.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) +@APPerCast@ Ability Power</expandRow>

name: Corrupted
desc: (@MinUnits@) Combat start: Lie dormant while absorbing the souls of allies that die. Gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power for each soul.
Once per combat at @HealthThreshold@% Health (or when your team has died), come alive and fight.

name: Supers
desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Combat start: Strike a pose that grants your team @BaseBonusDamage@% bonus damage, which increases by @BonusDamagePer3Star@% for every 3-star champion on your team.</row>
Bonus damage: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT8_Supers_TotalBonusDamage@%

name: Renegade
desc: Renegade units deal bonus damage, and the last one standing deals more.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) @BasePercentBonusDamage@% bonus damage, extra @AdditionalBonusDamage@% for last alive</expandRow>

name: Spellslinger
desc: Every @RefreshSeconds@ seconds, Spellslinger's next attack instead fires a magic orb at a random target, which explodes for @MagicDamage@% Ability Power as magic damage.
Spellslingers gain:
<row>(@MinUnits@) +@AP@ Ability Power</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) +@AP@ Ability Power</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) +@AP@ Ability Power</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) +@AP@ Ability Power, and orbs deal @MagicDamage@% Ability Power</row>

name: Sureshot
desc: Combat start: Sureshots gain bonus Attack Damage now, and every @Frequency@ seconds.
<expandRow>(@MinUnits@) +@BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage</expandRow>

name: Defender
desc: Your team gains bonus Armor, and Defenders gain more.
<expandRow> (@MinUnits@) +@BonusArmor@ Armor, +@DefenderBonusArmor@ for Defenders</expandRow>

name: Gadgeteen
desc: Each round, Gadgeteens create random modified weapons with powerful effects that fall apart after one round. Gadgeteens also gain Damage and Damage Reduction for each item equipped to them.
<row>(@MinUnits@) Create @ItemsToMake@ item, @Itembuff@% per item.</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) Create @ItemsToMake@ items, @Itembuff@% per item.</row>

name: Hacker
desc: Hackers gain <TFTKeyword>Omnivamp</TFTKeyword> and summon a H4ckerr!m. Any unit placed in the rider hex will be sent to the enemy backline and is untargetable for the first @SecondsUntargetable@ seconds of combat.
<row>(@MinUnits@) +@Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) +@Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp for Hackers, +@Horsevamp*100@% for the rider</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) +@Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp for Hackers, +@Horsevamp*100@% for the rider</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) +@Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp for Hackers, +@Horsevamp*100@% for the rider</row>
<tftitemrules><tftbold>Omnivamp</tftbold>: heal for some of damage dealt</tftitemrules>
